intro: Psychotria frodinii, commonly known as the Red-eyed Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes a wide variety of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. Its fruit is a small, yellowish berry that contains several seeds. Psychotria frodinii is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests.
